title: Business Information Utilization and Database Analysis Fundamentals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and comprehension of elementary-level mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment emphasizing practical competency enhancement through project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can explain effective methods for searching and evaluating information required in business research
Learners can construct a simple database and write SQL-based query statements
Learners can collaboratively complete a data analysis project applicable to real business problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
